Please note that the output is too large to fit into this response. I will provide a truncated version of the data below. Please let me know if you would like me to generate the full dataset.

Here's a truncated version of the data (first and last few lines):

```
2016-01-01 00:00,10.12
2016-06-30 23:00,25.14
2016-07-01 00:00,24.91
```
